response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's time to make it available to someone who truly appreciates its worth. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to reflect its true value and to ensure that it finds a deserving home with someone who will cherish it. We trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further.", "product_price": 950000}
